articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Pyongyang Mushroom Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Pyongyang Mushroom Farm
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Pyongyang Mushroom Farm.
					 He personally initiated the building of the farm, chose the site of the farm on the outskirts of Pyongyang and not only dispatched competent designing and construction forces for its construction but took a benevolent measure for solving all problems arising in its construction.
					
					 Enjoying a bird's-eye view of the farm with a bright smile on his face, he said that production buildings and annexes built in the vast area look peculiar, neat and tidy. He was pleased with the environment of the farm where formative art was applied at a high level. He noted with pleasure that the farm has radically changed the appearance of the area.
					
					 After being briefed on the farm before a map showing its panoramic view, he went round the raw material, fermenting, seeding, cultivating and raising rooms, technical preparation room, the combined control room and the sci-tech knowledge dissemination room and various other places of the farm.
					
					 He noted that the farm established well the management information, production control and automatic control systems on the basis of real-time check of useful information to organize production and management, adding that an integrated production system ranging from raw material feeding to forwarding was perfectly set up to put the production processes on a highly automated and streamlined basis.
					
					 Learning that the equipment of the farm was made with indigenous efforts, technology and materials, he said that the longer he watched them they looked nice. He was pleased that the Party's policy of carrying out modernization in reliance on Juche-oriented forces and technology was thoroughly implemented in the construction of the farm.
					
					 Praising the Pyongyang Mushroom Farm as an icon and standard of the nation's mushroom farms, he highly appreciated the feats the designing and construction units have performed by successfully completing it as a proud structure in the era of the Workers' Party and another precious treasure greatly conducive to the improvement of the people's diet.
					
					 He expressed belief that the officials and employees of the farm would fully discharge their duty, and had a photo session with them.
					
					 Accompanying him were Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, vice-chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission and premier of the Cabinet, Jo Yong Won, vice department director of the C.C., WPK, and Ma Won Chun, director of the Designing Department of the State Affairs Commission.

articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a reply message from Bashar Al-Assad, president of Syria, on April 6.
					 The message expressed gratitude to Kim Jong Un for his kind congratulations on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party.
					
					 It also expressed thanks to him for having appreciated the role of the Party guiding the Syrian Arab people in the struggle to meet such challenges as sinister actions of the world's terrorists and encouraged Syria to successfully weather the crisis without fail.
					
					 It expressed belief that the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: SPA Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
SPA Delegation Back Home
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) led by Deputy Ri Jong Hyok, director of the National Reunification Institute, returned home Saturday after taking part in the 136th Conference of the Inter-Parliamentary Union held in Bangladesh.

articles.title: U.S. Missile Attack on Syria Unpardonable: Spokesman of DPRK FM
articles.content:
U.S. Missile Attack on Syria Unpardonable: Spokesman of DPRK FM
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The Trump administration on April 7 mounted a massive missile attack on an air force base of the Syrian government army under the pretext that it killed civilians by using chemical weapons.
					 A spokesman of the DPRK Foreign Ministry in a statement issued on April 8 termed this absolutely unpardonable as it was an undisguised act of aggression against a sovereign state.
					
					 The world clearly witnessed through the recent U.S. military attack on Syria who is disturbing peace, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The successive U.S. administrations have perpetrated strikes at those countries which do not have nukes only, styling themselves a superpower and the same is true of the Trump administration.
					
					 Some forces are loud-mouthed that the recent U.S. military attack on Syria is on action of warning us but we are not frightened by it.
					
					 What happened in Syria once again taught a bitter lesson that no one should have an illusion about the imperialists and one can defend oneself from the imperialist aggression only when one has one's strength.
					
					 Our tremendous military muscle with a nuclear force as its pivot serves as a treasured sword of justice capable of foiling the U.S. shameless high-handed and arbitrary practices and aggressive moves and protecting the sovereignty of the country and the right of the nation to existence.
					
					 The reality today goes to prove that any aggression should be countered with force only and we were entirely just when we have a bolstered our nuclear force remarkably.
					
					 We will bolster up in every way our capability for self-defence to cope with the U.S. evermore reckless moves for a war and defend ourselves with our own force.

articles.title: DPRK FM Sends Letter to Secretary General of ASEAN
articles.content:
DPRK FM Sends Letter to Secretary General of ASEAN
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The foreign minister of the DPRK sent a letter to the secretary general of the ASEAN.
					 The DPRK embassy in Jakarta handed the letter to the ASEAN Secretariat on April 4.
					
					 Noting that the situation on the Korean Peninsula is evolving out of control due to the annual war games conducted by the U.S. and south Korea, the letter said:
					
					 They are conducting these exercises from March in accordance with the scheme of nuclear preemptive strike, mobilizing the unprecedented scale of nuclear strategic assets such as nuclear submarine, nuclear strategic bombers, not to mention the attack forces including a nuclear aircraft carrier. The purpose of these exercises is none other than to overthrow our system.
					
					 The present situation on the Korean Peninsula eloquently substantiates how right we were to possess nuclear weapons and to take the measures of strengthening the national defence.
					
					 As we have already clarified, we will continue to build up our self-defense capability, the pivot of which is the nuclear force, and the capability for pre-emptive strike as long as the U.S. and its vassal forces keep on nuclear threats and blackmail and as long as they do not stop their war games they stage at our doorstep disguising them as annual events.
					
					 The largest-ever nuclear war games, staged by the U.S. and south Korea are the root cause that pushes the DPRK to take toughest counter-measures and this is the unanimous assessment of the international community.
					
					 I express my expectation that ASEAN which attaches great importance to the regional peace and stability will make an issue of the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises at ASEAN conferences from fair position and play an active role in safeguarding the peace and stability of the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Delegation of Chinese Dongfangyi Tuozhan Association Visits DPRK
articles.content:
Delegation of Chinese Dongfangyi Tuozhan Association Visits DPRK
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Dongfangyi Tuozhan Association of China led by Chairperson Dongfang Yi visited the DPRK from April 4 to 8.
					 During the visit the delegation laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and paid tribute to them.
					
					 It also presented a gift to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The delegation paid courtesy calls on a vice-chairman of the Social Scientists Society of Korea and the director of the Korean General Film Company. And its members and officials of the Disarmament and Peace Institute of the DPRK Foreign Ministry, the Social Scientists Society, the Ministry of External Economic Relations and the Korean General Film Company exchanged views on the situation of the Korean peninsula and Northeast Asia and matters of developing the friendly and cooperative ties between the DPRK and China.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Sci-tech Complex, Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery, Friendship Tower, Central Zoo and the Natural History Museum.
					
					 The chairperson wrote in a visitor's book after touring the Sci-tech Complex as follows:
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un, Supreme Leader of the DPRK, is the best in ideology, science and technology and the incarnation of the whole world as he respects people, shows the warmest love for them and devotedly serves them.
					
					 Dongfang Yi, chairperson of the Dongfangyi Touzhan Association of China April 6, 2017.

articles.title: Participants in People's Art Festival Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Participants in People's Art Festival Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Fifth April Spring People's Art Festival Saturday visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun.
					 They paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues at the palace in profound reverence for them.
					
					 They paid homage to the great leaders at the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display, and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats for Korea's Reunification Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats for Korea's Reunification Lauded
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- On the occasion of the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Institute for Disarmament and Peace of the DPRK Foreign Ministry on Saturday announced a memorial report that summarizes his contributions to the creation of international environment favorable for Korea's reunification.
					 Referring to the fact that President Kim Il Sung had worked hard to strengthen the international support and solidarity with the DPRK's line of national reunification, the report said:
					
					 The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung advanced the most fair and reasonable line and policies for national reunification and made energetic efforts to strengthen international support and solidarity with them.
					
					 The three charters for national reunification set forth by him are fair and reasonable ones that are acceptable and agreeable to anyone.
					
					 The three principles of independence, peace and great national unity for national reunification was set forth in the 1970s when the anti-imperialist independent forces were rapidly expanding in Asia and the rest of the world whereas the imperialist forces were significantly disintegrated and weakened.
					
					 The proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK) that clarified full pictures of reunified state and ways for its realization reflects the universal truth and the world's hard reality that no one can deny.
					
					 Denying the other party's ideology and system and pursuing unification based on one side's ideology and system is tantamount to a declaration that they do not want reunification but war. The only peaceful way to unify different ideologies and systems is to realize the reunification by means of federation formula. In fact, one third of the world population live in various types of federal states. It is today's reality that different systems co-exist in a country.
					
					 The ten-point programme of great unity of the whole nation, which clarified the ultimate goal, ideological basis, principles and concrete ways for the great national unity also reflects the Korean nation's demand, interests and experience as well as aspirations and desire of the progressive mankind. The programme is run through with fair and persuasive articles that everybody can accept regardless of ideology, political view and system.
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung had conducted energetic external activities to strengthen international support and solidarity with the reunification line.
					
					 His energetic external activities and wise leadership aroused full support and sympathy with the DPRK's reunification proposals from heads of party, state and government and political and social personages of many countries.
					
					 The three principles of national reunification enjoyed unanimous support at the 28th UN General Assembly in 1973. The 4th and 5th summit meetings of non-aligned states in 1973 and 1976 adopted resolutions that fully supported the reunification policy of the DPRK government. In June 1977, the International Liaison Committee for Korea's Reunification and Peace was founded and international conferences were held successively in support of the Korean people's cause of reunification.
					
					 More than 1.6 billion people from 105 countries participated in the international signature campaign that took place from March 1981 to March 1982 in support of the DFRK founding proposal. Over 1.7 billion people from 150-odd countries took part in the signature campaign from April to October 1994 in support of the Ten-Point Programme of Great Unity of the Whole Nation.
					
					 Noting that President Kim Il Sung had striven to reject outsiders' interference and create peaceful environment for Korea's reunification, the report said:
					
					 Since the early days of the country's division, the great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung set forth the policy of independent reunification free from foreign interference and wisely guided the external activities for putting an end to the U.S. military occupation of south Korea.
					
					 The DPRK government staged vigorous struggle to create international environment favorable for national reunification under his wise guidance. As a result, the 28th UN General Assembly in 1973 passed a resolution on dismantlement of the UN Commission on the Unification and Rehabilitation of Korea which had been misused as a tool for legalizing the sustained division of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 In March 1974 the great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung saw to it that the 3rd Session of the 5th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK sent a letter proposing the U.S. Congress to hold the DPRK-U.S. talks to discuss peace treaty and withdrawal of all foreign troops from Korea. He also led vigorously external activities to adopt a resolution in support of the proposal at the UN General Assembly.
					
					 At the 30th UN General Assembly in 1975, the DPRK's proposal for replacing the armistice with a durable peace and creating condition favorable for promotion of independent and peaceful reunification of Korea was adopted by an overwhelming majority, thus totally frustrating the U.S. attempts to legalize its military occupation of south Korea by separating the issue of dismantlement of the "UN Command" and the issue of withdrawal of U.S. troops from south Korea.
					
					 The report cited data to show that President Kim Il Sung had wisely led the work to reduce tension and ensure peace in the Korean Peninsula and create environment favorable for national reunification.
					
					 It also elaborated on the efforts made by leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un to further glorify the exploits of President Kim Il Sung for national reunification.
					
					 It is the fixed will of Kim Jong Un to build a dignified, prosperous and powerful, reunified country on this land without fail, true to the noble, patriotic intension and wishes of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the report said, adding:
					
					 Under his guidance, the great leaders' behests for national reunification will be implemented without fail.

articles.title: Lots of Gifts to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Lots of Gifts to Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung had received 660,000 gifts from Koreans at home, overseas Koreans and south Koreans for over a century since the people of Chilgol presented a brass ware to him on April 15, Juche 2 (1913).
					 Hunters Ri Su Dok and her husband who had lived in Phyonggang County, Kangwon Province, presented a tiger skin to the President after the liberation of the country.
					
					 Korean people presented a number of gifts such as folding screen-style poem, silver candle stand, table clock to the President even in the grim period of the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Gifts were presented to him more than 9,180 times in April in 1972.
					
					 Overseas Koreans and south Koreans presented over 94,000 precious gifts to him, holding him in high esteem as the sun of the nation and lodestar of national reunification.
					
					 Han Tok Su, former chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, presented a poem and folding screen, table-style congratulatory letters to the President, reflecting the ardent wishes of all Koreans in Japan to hold him in high esteem as their eternal leader.
					
					 Choe Hong Hui, former president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation, presented dozens of gifts including rare crystal cup and tea tray to the President.
					
					 Mun Son Myong offered the President a gold work "Korean map" as a gift in appreciation of his total dedication to national reunification.
					
					 Kim U Jung, former chairman of Taewoo Group of south Korea, presented to him a gold work "Long life" depicting the sun, turtle, deer, crane, pine, symbolic of good health and longevity, and other things.
					
					 South Korean people of various strata presented a great number of gifts such as embroidery "Manggyongdae in flowers".
					
					 Those gifts will shine forever and be handed down to posterity as national treasures of Kim Il Sung's Korea and ever-lasting treasures thanks to the devotion of all compatriots.

articles.title: 22nd Cooking Festival
articles.content:
22nd Cooking Festival
Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The 22nd Cooking Festival took place at the Pyongyang Noodle House on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (April 15).
					 The festival was attended by at least 80 public service units of ministries and national institutions, Pyongyang and all provinces.
					
					 Presented to it were famous dishes, local specialties, world-known dishes and scientific and technical achievements made in developing cuisines and culinary culture of the country.
					
					 What drew attention of visitors were the contest of practical skills and demonstration of cooks and waiters and waitresses and cooking skills of students from over 10 universities, including Pyongyang Jang Chol Gu University of Commerce, whose major is culinary art.
					
					 O Hyon Hui, a student from Phyongsong University of Technology, told KCNA that she came to gain much experience and deepen her knowledge through the festival, saying she would always remember the day when she gave her premiere at the cooking skills of students.

articles.title: Production of Chestnut Saplings Put on Intensive Basis
articles.content:
Production of Chestnut Saplings Put on Intensive Basis
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The production of high-yielding large chestnut saplings was put on an intensive basis in the DPRK, as part of the efforts for turning the whole country into a thick woodland, greenery and orchard.
					 In the past, it took 3 years to produce saplings by grafting scion on one year-old rootstock, which is low in the rate of rooting.
					
					 The Unsan Chestnut Nursery together with scientists of the Economic Forest Institute under the Academy of Forest Science completed a new method to produce saplings by grafting caulicle on radicle.
					
					 This method makes it possible to mass-produce grafted saplings in less production area and save manpower. 
					
					 It is said that full-grown large chestnut tree is about 3 meters high and ten times higher than existing ones in per-hectare yield.
					
					 The nursery is going to produce hundreds of thousands of saplings this year.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on Impudent Remarks of U.S. Representative at UN
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on Impudent Remarks of U.S. Representative at UN
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The group of Yankees has gone so impudent as to turn white to black enough to stun the world. 
					 The U.S. representative at UN recently said the negotiations on the convention on banning nuclear weapons are unrealistic due to "nuclear threat from north Korea".
					
					 Pointing out the DPRK as a pretext for its absence at the UN conference on the negotiations, she said that no one would believe north Korea would agree on banning nuclear weapons and that it is not reasonable to assert that people can be protected by way of not allowing countries like the U.S. working hard for peace and security the access to nuclear weapons but by allowing bad parties the access.
					
					 This is impudent and gangster-like sophism and just a revelation of the sinister intention to cover up the hideous crime of the U.S. which is the only country in the world that used nuclear weapons and has caused worldwide nuclear arms race through nuclear threat and blackmail.
					
					 To look back on the history of the development of nuclear weapons, big powers like the U.S. spearheaded international conventions on nuclear weapons and were present or absent at the meetings regarding them in their own interests for the purpose of banning non nuclear states from having access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 It is quite natural that the DPRK did not take part in the UN conference on negotiating the ban on nuclear weapons which premised on dismantlement of nuclear weapons as it towered as the nuclear power in the East to cope with the U.S. hideous nuclear threat that has lasted for decades.
					
					 To realize its ambition for world domination, the U.S. did not hesitate to inflict nuclear holocaust on humankind, and mocked at international treaties on nuclear disarmament and connived, overlooked and defended the development of nuclear weapons by its cat's paw nations. The U.S. is, indeed, the kingpin of nuclear proliferation.
					
					 The U.S., which trumpeted about building a "world without nuclear weapons" more loudly than others, is now openly calling for "bolstering nuclear force to maintain an unchallenged edge in military capability" while complaining that "the U.S. nuclear force is left behind other country's".
					
					 Even at the moment it is invariably carrying on nuclear weapons modernization requiring 1 trillion USD that had been pushed forward since the preceding administration under the motto of "peace by strength".  It openly calls for abolishing the nuclear disarmament treaties with other nuclear powers.
					
					 Such a ferocious nuclear monster is faulting the nuclear force of the DPRK, the direct product of its nuclear blackmail. This is the height of absurdity and impudence.
					
					 The U.S. has to clearly understand the invariable stand of the DPRK that as long as there exists a nuclear weapons state hostile toward the DPRK, the security of the nation and the peace of the Korean peninsula can be protected only by dint of dependable nuclear deterrence.
					
					 The more viciously the U.S. and its vassal forces pose nuclear threat and blackmail, the more strongly the DPRK will bolster the military capabilities for self-defence and preemptive attack with the nuclear force as a pivot.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Snipes at German FM's Reckless Tongue-lashing
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Snipes at German FM's Reckless Tongue-lashing
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The German foreign minister at a home press interview on Wednesday hurled mud at the DPRK, according to media reports.
					 Crying out for tightening sanctions against the DPRK as it refuses to comply with the "resolutions" of the UN Security Council, the foreign minister let out a string of rubbish that the misanthropic Pyongyang regime is suppressing north Korean citizens in the cruelest manner and the irresponsible politics of Pyongyang goes against international law to threaten peace and security of the world beyond region.
					
					 Such outbursts are not suitable for the foreign minister of a country. It seems that the German foreign minister is so ignorant of the DPRK that he was utterly reckless with his words.
					
					 If the foreign minister of a country wants to speak about other country, he should have at least elementary knowledge about that country in order not to be seized with prejudice in his comment.
					
					 The socialist system in the DPRK is the most advantageous system in the world which regards human beings as the most valuable existence and makes everything serve the popular masses.
					
					 The DPRK regards the improvement of the standard of people's living as the supreme principle of its state activities. It is the consistent political mode of its party and state to devotedly serve the people.
					
					 The people in the DPRK are free from taxes, doctor's fee and tuition and there are no jobless people in the DPRK. Such fact is something unbelievable in the West plagued by false propaganda against the DPRK.
					
					 Everyone remembers that the "misanthropic regime" touted by the German foreign minister once existed in Germany.
					
					 His call for slapping harsher sanctions by following the U.S. moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK cannot be construed otherwise than a paradox calling for threatening the existence and life of the Korean people.
					
					 He seemed to echo outbursts of the U.S. conservative politicians without his own objective and fair-minded understanding and view. Such behavior is not suitable for his position as the foreign minister of a European power.
					
					 He had better see for himself what is going on in the world through a foreign tour, not revealing his ignorance through his reckless tongue-lashing.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Flails S. Korean Regime's Sycophancy toward U.S.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Flails S. Korean Regime's Sycophancy toward U.S.
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet conservative group, whose fate is at stake after being cursed and rejected by the public, works hard to stay in power, calling for "priority to the relations" with the U.S. and "strengthened alliance".
					 The authorities of south Korea, typically acting President Hwang Kyo An, have zealously asked the U.S. to strengthen "alliance", terming the entirely just steps taken by the DPRK to bolster its capabilities for self-defence "provocation" and "threat."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article says it is a stupid deed of the traitors seized with ill-minded inveterate repugnancy and hostility toward the compatriots in the north and sycophancy toward the U.S.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The puppet regime's call for "priority to the relations" with the U.S. and "strengthened alliance" is, in essence, a call for escalating confrontation with the DPRK and igniting a war against it.
					
					 The south Korea-U.S. "alliance" is just a war alliance to carry out the U.S. policy for isolating and stifling the DPRK and realize its foreign strategy of aggression.
					
					 The relations between the U.S. and the south Korean regime are no more than master-servant relations. The "alliance", in actuality, serves as a lever for the U.S. to tighten its control over colony-like south Korea and use its lackeys as a shock brigade for invading the DPRK.
					
					 If the conservative regime of south Korea continues desperately resorting to the policy of "priority to the relations" with the U.S. and "strengthened alliance", it will only further their master-servant relations, bring the north-south ties to a catastrophe and escalate the danger of nuclear war.
					
					 The "alliance", a root cause of all sorts of misfortune and an obstacle to peace and reunification, should be dissolved without further delay.
					
					 The lesson taught by history is that the only way out for the south Korean regime is not to call for "strengthened alliance" with the U.S. but to join hands with the fellow countrymen in the north and mend the north-south relations.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Moves for World Supremacy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Moves for World Supremacy
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. air force based in Japan conducted the first air refueling to the latest stealth fighter F-35B.
					 If this fighter with 2 200 km of maximum flying range makes a sortie, its operation is possible on the Korean peninsula. With air refueling, its radius of operation is greatly expanded.
					
					 The U.S. says the air refueling to the fighter laid a springboard for carrying out key operations on the peninsula in contingency.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary terms this an indication of the U.S. imperialists' invariable intention to expand the radius of their operation beyond the peninsula and take an absolute military edge over its potential rivals for the purpose of realizing the ambition to dominate the world at any cost.
					
					 The air refueling to F-35B, timed to coincide with the expansion of the missile defense system to the Asia-Pacific region, is a clear proof of the U.S. intention to expand the scope of its preemptive attack to other countries, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 It is quite natural that the U.S. reckless military act is sparking off vigilance of regional countries as it poses a threat to peace and disturbs the strategic stability in the Korean peninsula and the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 Owing to the U.S. reckless arms buildup to hold an absolute military edge, the Asia-Pacific region has turned into a theater of fierce playing of chicken among big powers, and global peace and security are seriously threatened.
					
					 It is natural for the DPRK to bolster its war deterrent for self-defense in every way in order to smash the U.S. reckless military moves and preserve the country's peace and regional stability.
					
					 The U.S. should not harbor a foolish daydream that it can stifle the DPRK. That will lead it to doom.

articles.title: U.S. Forces in S. Korea Introduce Biochemical War Equipment
articles.content:
U.S. Forces in S. Korea Introduce Biochemical War Equipment
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggressors in south Korea introduced biochemical war equipment into the base of the U.S. forces at Pusan Port, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The U.S. imperialists intensified the research for putting the "Jupiter plan" into practice in the facilities of the U.S. forces at the Pusan Port last year and introduced new equipment as a part of the plan.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Warmongers to Stage Large Combined Firing Drill
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Warmongers to Stage Large Combined Firing Drill
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers plan to stage a large combined firing drill in the training ground in Phochon, Kyonggi Province from April 13 to 26, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 Involved in the drill to be conducted as part of Foal Eagle joint war rehearsal will be tanks, armed vehicles, MLRS, helicopters, fighters and other latest war hardware of the U.S. aggression forces and south Korean puppet army.
					
					 The south Korean warmongers are going to open the drill to residents, students and foreigners under the pretext of showing off their muscle.

articles.title: U.S. Administration Urged to Make Switchover in Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Administration Urged to Make Switchover in Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Ri Jong Hyok, head of the delegation of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly  and director of the National Reunification Institute, spoke at the  plenary meeting of the 136th Conference of the Inter-Parliamentary Union on April 4. 
					 The head of the delegation denounced the U.S. and other hostile forces for making desperate efforts to stifle the DPRK and trample down the dignity and happiness of the Korean people while persisting in the harsh economic sanctions and war drills.
					
					 They instigated the UNSC to adopt "resolutions on sanctions" and press statements against the DPRK one after another while pulling up the DPRK over its measures for self defense as "threat" and "provocation" to the global peace and security and are working hard to totally strangulate the DPRK's economy, he said, adding:
					
					 The Korean peninsula is exposed to the danger of war as legal and institutional mechanisms for preventing the war and armed conflict are completely destroyed and the DPRK is threatened by the UNSC's "resolutions on sanctions", little short of declaration of a war.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are staging an all-out struggle for building a sci-tech power, economic power and highly-civilized nation despite all sorts of sanctions and war drills of the imperialists.
					
					 Neither nuclear threat nor economic sanctions can ever hold in check the dynamic advance of the army and people of the DPRK who turned out to build an invincible socialist power on an unchangeable orbit of independence and Songun.
					
					 The new U.S. administration should properly understand the strategic position of the DPRK that has ranked itself among the advanced nuclear powers, face up to the trend of the times and behave with prudence and self-restraint and make a bold decision to bring about a switchover in its policy after drawing a due lesson from the failed DPRK policy of the Obama administration.
					
					 We take this opportunity to express thanks to various countries for extending support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for peace and security on the Korean peninsula and the country's independent and peaceful reunification.
					
					 We assure that the DPRK will as ever join hands with all countries friendly toward it and strive hard to build an independent new world where dignity and wellbeing of the peoples are ensured, he concluded.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Norway
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Norway
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was formed in Norway on April 4.
					 Dag Norum, chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, his birth anniversary.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Italy
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Italy
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- An Italian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was formed in Rome on April 3.
					 Alfonso Galdi, department director of the Communist Party of Italy, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and organize colorful political and cultural events for support to the just cause of the Korean army and people, who are invariably advancing along the road of socialism under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un while frustrating the frantic moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK, on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of the President.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked Worldwide
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked Worldwide
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Activities for splendidly celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung are brisk across the world.
					 After the emergence of the first preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary, in Syria in Janauary last year, many preparatory committees have been formed on a nationwide scale or by political parties and organizations across the world. The number of preparatory committees totals to more than 70, including international and regional preparatory committees.
					
					 In Russia alone, 10-odd preparatory committees were organized by various political parties and bodies such as the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia and the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK.
					
					 The Nepalese national preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun in a declaration appealed to the world progressives to significantly celebrate the birthday of Kim Il Sung who made immortal contribution to the cause of global independence, stressing that his great idea and exploits will remain forever in history.
					
					 Governments, political parties and organizations of different countries and international and regional bodies and personages of various circles have expressed their reverence for the President through their statements.
					
					 Those preparatory committees are organizing diverse celebration events such as meeting, seminar, round-table talks, book and photo exhibition and film show day after day.
					
					 And many political and social personages are visiting the DPRK missions in their countries with floral baskets and bouquets and coming to Pyongyang.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Fabrica de Hongos de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Fabrica de Hongos de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Hongos de Pyongyang, unidad ejemplar de las fabricas de hongo del pais.
					El Maximo Dirigente tuvo la iniciativa de la construccion de la fabrica, tomo personalmente su solar en el suburbio de la ciudad, despacho las poderosas fuerzas de diseno y construccion y resolvio todos los problemas pendientes en la obra.
					
					Mirando con amplia sonrisa el panorama de la fabrica, dijo que son peculiares y vistosos los edificios de produccion y los otros auxiliares, levantados en la vasta area. Me gusta el ambiente de la fabrica construida en el alto nivel plastico y artistico, subrayo y se alegro diciendo que los contornos de la fabrica se han cambiado mucho gracias a la edificacion de esta planta.
					
					Luego de escuchar las explicaciones ante el mapa panoramico de la fabrica, recorrio varios puntos de fabrica como los lugares de materias primas, fermentacion, siembra y cultivo y las salas de preparacion tecnica, control universal de produccion, divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas, etc.
					
					Evaluo el sistema de informaciones de gestion, el de la administracion de produccion y el control automatico que permiten organizar la produccion a base de las informaciones necesarias recogidas en tiempo real y desarrollar las actividades administrativas. Senalo que gracias al perfecto sistema de produccion integrada desde el ofrecimiento de materias primas y el envio de mercancias, se realizaron en alto nivel la automatizacion de los procesos de produccion.
					
					Todas las instalaciones de la fabrica son hechas por la fuerza, tecnica y materiales propias, elogio y dijo con satisfaccion que hayan cumplido estrictamente la orientacion del Partido en materia de modernizar la fabrica apoyandose en las fuerzas autoctonas y las tecnologias nacionales.
					
					La Fabrica de Hongos de Pyongyang constituye una planta enorgullecedora y modelo de las fabricas de hongos en nuestro pais, destaco y aprecio las proezas de las unidades de diseno y construccion que han contribuido a levantarla como una obra de creacion de la epoca del Partido del Trabajo y como otro patrimonio que hara activo aporte al mejoramiento de la vida alimentaria del pueblo.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente expuso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica cumpliran con su mision y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC, vicepresidente del CE de la RPDC y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, Jo Yong Won, subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC y Ma Won Chun, director de diseno del CE.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta de Bashar al-Assad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta de Bashar al-Assad
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de respuesta que le enviara el dia 6 el Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al-Assad.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Extiendo a Vd. mi agradecimiento por haberme enviado cordiales felicitaciones con motivo del 70o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido Socialista del Resurgimiento Arabe.
					
					Tambien, le agradezco por haber evaluado el papel orientador del Partido Socialista del Resurgimiento Arabe, que conduce al pueblo arabe de Siria a la lucha por frustrar las groseras maniobras de los terroristas mundiales y vencer otros desafios que tropieza ahora mi pais, y haber estimulado para que mi pais supere sin falta y victoriosamente esta crisis. 
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad manifiesto mi conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre nuestros dos paises amistosos se consolidaran mas en el futuro conforme a los intereses de los pueblos de los dos paises. 
					
					Reciba el testimonio de mi mas alta consideracion.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta del secretario general de PPRL
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta del secretario general de PPRL
Pyongyang, 9 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, recibio mensaje de respuesta que le remitiera el 24 de marzo el secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao, Bounnhang Vorachith.
					La misiva senala:
					
					Le extiendo a Vd. mis sinceros agradecimientos en el nombre del CC del PPRL y en el mio propio por haberme enviado la calida felicitacion, el saludo de votos y el hermoso cesto de flores con motivo del 62o aniversario de la fundacion del PPRL.
					
					Estoy seguro de que bajo la direccion energica del PTC, encabezado por Vd., la RPDC seguira logrando nuevos y mayores exitos en el cumplimiento de la causa de construccion de la potencia socialista.
					
					Le hago votos a usted por su buena salud y los exitos en su trabajo noble.
					
					Deseo que se amplien y se desarrollen mas las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos partidos y los gobiernos y pueblos de dos paises.

articles.title: Premier coreano envia mensaje de condolencias a su homologo sueco
articles.content:
Premier coreano envia mensaje de condolencias a su homologo sueco
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- Pak Pong Ju, primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea envio el dia 8 un mensaje de condolencias a su homologo sueco Stefan Lofven en relacion con que hubo perdidas humanas debido al ataque terrorista ocasionado en Estocolmo.
					La misiva senalo que el pueblo coreano comparte el dolor de perdidas junto con el pueblo sueco y reafirmo la invariable posicion del gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en contra del terrorismo de todo tipo.
					
					Por otra parte, el mismo dia el canciller Ri Yong Ho envio un mensaje de condolencias a su homologa sueca Margot Elisabeth Wallstrom.

articles.title: Es intolerable el ataque de misil de EE.UU. contra Siria, senala el portavoz de MINREX
articles.content:
Es intolerable el ataque de misil de EE.UU. contra Siria, senala el portavoz de MINREX
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- El dia 7, la administracion de Trump perpetro el ataque de misiles de gran envergadura contra una base aerea del ejercito del gobierno sirio bajo el pretexto de que este asesino a los civiles usando las armas quimicas.
					No puede ser tolerado jamas este innegable acto agresivo contra un Estado soberano, senala el vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en una declaracion del dia 8 y continua:
					
					A traves del reciente ataque militar norteamericano contra Siria, el mundo ve claramente quien es perturbador y destructor de la paz.
					
					Las administraciones norteamericanas precedentes han venido cometiendo los actos brutales solamente contra los paises que no tienen las armas nucleares.
					
					Tambien, la actual administracion de Trump  no tiene ninguna diferencia con sus antecesoras.
					
					Algunos dicen que el citado ataque militar anti-Siria deviene una accion de "advertencia" a la RPDC, lo que no puede sorprender a esta.
					
					Este caso de Siria vuelve a ensenarnos la leccion de que la ilusion sobre los imperialistas es el danino absoluto y que hay que poseer la capacidad propia para defender a si mismo desde la agresion de los imperialistas.
					
					Nuestra capacidad militar centrada en las fuerzas armadas nucleares sirve del remedio omnipotente para frustrar el cinico despotismo, la arbitrariedad y las maniobras de agresion de EE.UU. y defender la soberania del pais y el derecho a existencia nacional.
					
					La realidad de hoy comprueba la verdad de que hay que enfrentar solo con la fuerza a la fuerza y que fue muy justa la opcion de la RPDC que ha venido intensificando constantemente las fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					Frente a las cada dia mas imprudentes maniobras belicas de EE.UU., la RPDC consolidara por todos los medios la capacidad de autodefensa nacional y nos protegeremos con nuestra fuerza propia.

articles.title: Delegacion china concluye la visita a la RPDC
articles.content:
Delegacion china concluye la visita a la RPDC
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ACNC) -- La delegacion de la Asociacion Dongfangyi Tuozhan de China, encabezada por su presidente Dongfang Yi, visito del dia 4 al 8 a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Durante su estancia, la delegacion rindio homenaje a los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il tras colocar ramos de flores ante sus estatuas de bronce en la capitalina colina Mansu y dedico presente al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Realizo las visitas de cortesia al vicepresidente de la Asociacion Coreana de Cientificos Sociales y al director general de la Compania General de Pelicula de Corea. 
					
					E intercambio las opiniones sobre los problemas como la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico y el desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion China-Corea con los funcionarios del Instituto de Desarme y Paz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores, la Asociacion Coreana de Cientificos Sociales, el Ministerio de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero y la Compania General de Pelicula de Corea.
					
					Recorrio el Palacio de Ciencias y Tecnicas, el Palacio de Escolares y Ninos de Mangyongdae, el Cementerio de Martires de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, el Monumento a la Amistad, el Parque Zoologico Nacional y el Museo de la Naturaleza. 
					
					Terminada la visita al primer palacio, el jefe de la delegacion china escribio en el libro de visitas: "El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Maximo Dirigente de Corea, es el mejor en la ideologia y las ciencias y tecnicas y el idolo de todo el mundo quien respeta y ama fervientemente al pueblo y sirve con abnegacion para este. 
					
					Dongfang Yi, presidente de la Asociacion Dongfangyi Tuozhan de China. El 6 de abril de 2017".
